00027 #include <sys/socket.h>
00028 
00029 #include <libfreedom/types.h>
00030 #include <libfreedom/layers.h>
00031 #include <libfreedom/liblog.h>
00032 
00033 #include "llp_packets.h"
00034 #include "llp_sessions.h"
00035 #include "llp_socket.h"
00036 #include "llp.h"
00037 
00038 /*============================================================================*/
00039 /* Public functions implementations.                                          */
00040 /*============================================================================*/           
00041 
00042 int llp_send_direct_packet(struct sockaddr_in *address, u_char *packet,
00043                 int length) {
00044         int return_value;
00045 
00046         if (llp_socket == LLP_CLOSED_SOCKET) {
00047                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "llp module not initialized.");
00048                 return LLP_ERROR;
00049         }
00050 
00051         return_value = sendto(llp_socket, packet, length, 0,
00052                         (struct sockaddr *)address,     sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));    
00053         
00054         return (return_value < length ? LLP_ERROR : LLP_OK);
00055 }
00056 /******************************************************************************/
00057 int llp_send_session_packet(int session, u_char *packet, int length) {
00058 
00059         return llp_send_direct_packet(&llp_sessions[session].address, packet,
00060                         length);
00061 }
00062 /******************************************************************************/
